pages.text: This glistening hoop creates a protective film of air around you.\\Grants you [#](495b24)4[#]() points of [#](2c2e8e)Azure Dike[#](). Using those charges, it not only protects you from enemy projectiles, but can even cushion a long fall.\The Puff Circlet also prevents [#](bb00bb)Farmland[#]() from being trampled.

pages.text: _Gone are the days of being sniped from behind by Skeletons._
